title: Laurence Steinberg Holds Faculty Workshop October 14 (Mercersburg Academy)
text: ( Source : Mercersburg Academy ) Dr. Laurence Steinberg , author of Age of Opportunity and one of the world's leading experts on adolescence, gave a workshop with the Mercersburg faculty October 14 . Steinberg is a Distinguished University
